statements: SELECT * FROM fertilizer_monitoring ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, fertilizer_type FROM fertilizer_monitoring WHERE application_rate > 10;
SELECT id, application_method, effectiveness FROM fertilizer_monitoring WHERE effectiveness < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_monitoring WHERE fertilizer_type = 'Organic' ORDER BY application_rate ASC;
SELECT id, date, application_method, application_rate, effectiveness FROM fertilizer_monitoring
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_monitoring WHERE application_rate > 5 ORDER BY date DESC, id ASC
SELECT id, date, fertilizer_type FROM fertilizer_monitoring WHERE application_method = 'Spraying' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_monitoring WHERE effectiveness BETWEEN 0.6 AND 0.8 AND fertilizer_type LIKE '%Organic%' ORDER BY effectiveness DESC, id ASC
SELECT id, application_rate, effectiveness FROM fertilizer_monitoring WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND application_method = 'Injection' ORDER BY effectiveness DESC
SELECT id, date, application_method, application_rate FROM fertilizer_monitoring WHERE application_rate <> 10 AND effectiveness < 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT fertilizer_type, amount_applied FROM fertilizer_applications WHERE crop_type = 'Corn';
SELECT crop_type, yield, year FROM crop_yields ORDER BY year ASC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_applications WHERE amount_applied > 100 ORDER BY application_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(yield) AS max_yield, MIN(yield) AS min_yield FROM crop_yields;
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_applications WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT id, crop_type, yield FROM crop_yields WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT AVG(amount_applied) AS avg_amount, fertilizer_type FROM fertilizer_applications GROUP BY fertilizer_type;
SELECT crop_type, MAX(yield) AS max_yield FROM crop_yields GROUP BY crop_type;
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_applications WHERE amount_applied > 100 ORDER BY amount_applied ASC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT id, type, quantity FROM fertilizer_applications WHERE type = 'Organic' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, effectiveness_score FROM effectiveness_analysis WHERE effectiveness_score > 4.5;
SELECT yield_date, yield_amount FROM crop_yields WHERE yield_amount > 1000 ORDER BY yield_amount ASC;
SELECT id, type, quantity FROM fertilizer_applications WHERE quantity BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_applications WHERE type = 'Organic' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT id, application_date, quantity FROM fertilizer_applications WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, analysis_date, effectiveness_score FROM effectiveness_analysis WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT batch_id, AVG(yield_amount) AS avg_yield FROM crop_yields GROUP BY batch_id HAVING AVG(yield_amount) > 100 ORDER BY avg_yield DESC;

SELECT fa.id, ca.yield_amount, ea.effectiveness_score FROM fertilizer_applications fa JOIN crop_yields ca ON fa.id = ca.batch_id JOIN effectiveness_analysis ea ON fa.id = ea.batch_id WHERE ca.yield_amount > 150 ORDER BY ca.yield_amount DESC, ea.effectiveness_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_applications;
SELECT id, application_date, fertilizer_name FROM fertilizer_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT crop_type, amount_applied FROM fertilizer_applications WHERE amount_applied > 100;
SELECT * FROM crop_yields WHERE effectiveness_rating >= 4 ORDER BY yield_amount DESC;
SELECT field_name, location FROM fields WHERE field_size > 50 ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fields WHERE field_size > 100
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_conditions ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT crop_type, SUM(yield_amount) AS total_yield FROM crop_yields GROUP BY crop_type HAVING total_yield > 500
SELECT field_name, field_size, location FROM fields JOIN crop_yields ON fields.id = crop_yields.id
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_applications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_application;
SELECT crop_id, application_date, quantity_applied FROM fertilizer_application WHERE fertilizer_type = 'organic';
SELECT crop_id, application_date, quantity_applied FROM fertilizer_application WHERE quantity_applied > 100;
SELECT crop_id, application_date, quantity_applied FROM fertilizer_application ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_id FROM crop_yield WHERE weather_condition = 'rainy';
SELECT * FROM fertilizer_application WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop WHERE harvest_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT field_id, location, size FROM field WHERE size > 10;
SELECT crop_id, AVG(yield_amount) AS average_yield FROM crop_yield GROUP BY crop_id;
SELECT farmer_name, location, contact_number FROM farmer ORDER BY location DESC;
